description:
The girls` C-rank healer internships begin! For one month, Reimi goes to the Honosaka Clinic, Hibiki to KMU, and Kana to a clinic in the USA! But as the month ends, a cryptic message from Kana leads this new healer trio on an adventure halfway around the world!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Wir haben die C-Lizenz zum Healen!
私たち, C級ヒーラーです!
